Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Where transmission should store config files and logs.

Config.Name: TRANSMISSION_WEB_HOME
Config.Description: Specify the path to an alternative UI folder.

Config.Name: USER
Config.Description: Specify an optional username for the interface

Config.Name: PASS
Config.Description: Specify an optional password for the interface

Config.Name: WHITELIST
Config.Description: Specify an optional list of comma separated ip whitelist. Fills rpc-whitelist setting.

Config.Name: PEERPORT
Config.Description: Specify an optional port for torrent TCP/UDP connections. Fills peer-port setting.

Config.Name: HOST_WHITELIST
Config.Description: Specify an optional list of comma separated dns name whitelist. Fills rpc-host-whitelist setting.
